name: Gohan Quest
description:
Gohan Quest is a humorous adventure RPG that takes place in modern Eastern Europe.Key features
  • Authentic and unique atmosphere of typical russian town.
  • Anime girls VS harsh reality!
  • Gotta find them all!
  • Beat the shit out of criminals, bums, stoners, rabid stray animals, etc.
  • Equip baseball bats, water pistols, soup ladles, laser pointers, fly swatters, valenoks, gas masks, and stuff.
  • Heal with kebabs, kefir, kvass, ice cream and sunflower seeds.
  • Advanced turn-based battle system
  • Non-linear world exploration
  • 7-10 hours of gameplay

Basically, Gohan Quest is a tribute to Earthbound, Undertale and other JRPG classics, but with its own style, plot and humor.
